title: [BIP-7] Adjust Token Emission Rate of BOR
body:
This proposal seeks to: Adjust the emission rate of the BOR token so that it becomes a fixed factor. At the same time, using the method of setting weights for each pool, just like the allocation points (AP) plan Sushiswap and Pancakeswap used. This proposal will distribute the BOR to each pool more reasonably.

Details are below:
BOR emission rate: 100 BOR/day
Total initial weight: 120

Ethereum
12 for ppt_oBTC pool
6 for ppt_oLTC pool
20 for oBTC pool
10 for oLTC pool
5 for all CLASS I satellite city pools
3 for all CLASS II satellite city pools
35 for oBTC Curve pool
Total Ethereum emission rate initial weight: 91
 
BSC
6 for ppt-oBTC pool
3 for ppt-oLTC pool
10 for all satellite city pools
 
Total BSC emission rate initial weight: 19
 
The primary motivating factor for this proposal is that the previous emission plan was not well developed, which prevented subsequent marketing collaboration and made it difficult to adjust the emission rate. The new proposal was designed to address these issues.
 
If this proposal is adopted, the emission rate of BOR will be fixed, and it will make boring farmers more clearly to calculate the output of each pool.
 
If this proposal is opposed, emission rate of BOR will keep the same.
choices: Yes, fix emission rate of BOR
author: 0x18cb5099Cd1B016d2cc4e64Ab9F781ecd07eCA19
